content: victor is the first installment in the love-skunked collection a complement to the lovestruck collection 1 because let s face it not everyone comes out on the happy side of a love triangle so a few of them will be honored with free patterns that can be found on everytrickonthehook com 2 this 9 inch afghan block pattern looks more complicated than it is i ve included detailed photos of every round to make things as easy as possible if you can handle post stitches you can handle this square the pattern testers rated it an advanced beginner pattern **now includes a border for an optional 12 inch block ** 1 http //www ravelry com/bundles/lovestruck-collection 2 http //everytrickonthehook com/
